Class NewGameView

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOverlayView, IView, INewGameView, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class NewGameView
extends OverlayView
implements INewGameView
    Implementation for the new game view, which lets the user enter parameters for a new game
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
